law.catch_line: Fees and charges -- Trust and agency fund.

text.section: All fees, charges, or other moneys collected or received by the board shall be paid into the State Treasury and credited to a trust and agency fund which shall not lapse, to be used by the board for the carrying out of the provisions of this chapter.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 26, effective July 15, 2002.
